name: Karamball
description:
Karamball (on paper) is a 2D physics-based, action/puzzle game with the "paper look".

In each of the 75 levels (this number will grow in consequent updates), your goal is to put the required amount of moving circle mass to a finish of the corresponding color. To change the direction of moving objects, create walls (lines) by dragging mouse pointer. You should avoid, or make use of, obstacles, enemies and exploding mines. Sometimes, it is necessary to unlock you way by keys and to use accelerators to go faster or change direction of moving objects. To obtain a better score, or even to accomplish a level with short timeout, you should pick bonuses.

Karamball provides also simple customization features, such as, changing or adding the background music, and manual creation of new levels or changing existing ones.

For more information see the Karamball home page https://bitbucket.org/Rado1/karamball/wiki/Home

Have fun!

Current version: 1.2, January 2015
Engine: ZGameEditor + ZgeBox2D physics library + ZgeSL sound library
